page.shortlink: api client api a5 panelcard setsize method

argument.name: lazy
argument.description: Whether or not to do a "lazy" resize. If true then sizing calculations will not be performed if the size has not changed.

argument.name: fireSizeEvent
argument.description: Whether or not to fire the onSize event.

page.description: Set the panel to a specific size.

discussion.p: This method is used automatically when the size of the panel is bound to "self", "parent" or "window". The set size method can be used programmatically to set the size of a panel when the panel's size in not bound.
